entry.title: Hosting Data Apps Website
entry.summary: You mastered Shiny and Dash, you followed best practices and your data application is production-ready. Now you only have to deploy and host your app. Information about hosting data apps is scattered around the Internet and often incomplete. The goal of the Hosting Data Apps website is to help you learn about your hosting options and to pick the option that suits your needs best.

entry.title: ShinyProxy 1-click App
entry.summary: Deploying interactive R Shiny applications at scale is easier than ever using the 1-Click ShinyProxy app by Analythium from the DigitalOcean Marketplace.

entry.title: Welcome to the Hub!
entry.summary: Welcome to the Analythium Hub! In this corner of the Internet, we talk about how we make things. The Hub is a website for Analythium's public and open source projects.
